oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Amrak sayidna. A play. Starring Antoine Kerbage, Elias Elias, Maha al-Ashkar, Maggie Badawi. Music by Ziad Rahbani. Fashion by Papo Lahoud. Directed by Zerab Yaqoubian. At the Casino of Lebanon Theater, January 30, 1985.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Amrak sayidna
